articles.title: Rapper Fred the Godson dies of coronavirus complications at 35 - Hindustan Times
articles.description: New York rapper Fred the Godson has died of coronavirus at the age of 35.
articles.content:
New York rapper Fred the Godson has died of Covid-19 related complications. He was 35.
